case.name: Australian Securities & Investments Commission v Bowesco Pty Ltd [2009] FCA 257 (23 March 2009)

citances.sentence: There was a further motion in a related matter also seeking that I recuse myself. There, the only issue for determination was the question of costs. The motion was, by consent, discontinued on 23 March 2009. I then delivered judgment in the matter: Australian Securities & Investment Commission v Bowesco [2009] FCA 257. History of proceeding
